subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Anne marks the position of her ball and taps down her marker with her putter. Audrey marks the position of her ball, lifts her ball and walks to the hole to remove a twig. She walks back and crouches down to read her putt. She notices that her marker has stuck to her shoe. At the same time, Anne notices that her marker is missing and has stuck to the bottom of her putter when she tapped her marker down. Do Anne and Audrey incur any penalties?.
